subject: Implement Standardized Error System
description:
Create consistent error format across all services:
1. Create /home/ken/developer-portal/src/lib/errors.ts
2. Define standard error shape: {error: {code, message, docs, retryable, project_id}}
3. Implement error codes: PROJECT_SUSPENDED, RATE_LIMITED, QUOTA_EXCEEDED, KEY_INVALID, SERVICE_DISABLED, PERMISSION_DENIED
4. Create error factory functions
5. Add error documentation page
6. Update all services to use standard format
7. Include retryable flag for client-side behavior

This provides DX credibility through predictable, actionable errors.
